title: Is the US recovering from the Corona virus? - Quora

response.answer_text: Still US( America) is not recovering from coronavirus because there are approximately 400000 cases and the mortality rate is also high like 1000 people per 24hours. So it can't be say it properly that US is recovering from coronavirus. But the president of US Trump ask from Prime Minister Modi for Hydroxychloroquine for the treatment of corona patient.

It doesn’t look like that if we see at the figures come daily. There are almost 4 lakh positive cases in US and they still don’t do lockdown all over the US. So it does’t look like US recovering from corona virus.
